Key Match Events: Tim David clobbers one down the ground for six
Rohit Sharma hit Mitchell Starc for 29 off an over
India's Rohit Sharma was named player of the match
Pre-Game Insights: India may have been unbeaten going into this game, but this was actually their first real challenge
Post-Match Reflections: India captain Mitchell Marsh said 'Yeah, it's so disappointing. We know we still have a chance to make the semis but today, India got the better of us.'
India captain Rohit Sharma said 'That's what I have to do at the top of the order, see what the bowlers are trying to do and play accordingly.'
Geoff Lemon said 'Well there's the game, surely.'
Miscellaneous Highlights: India will face England in their semi-final in Guyana on Thursday
Australia's fate is now out of their own hands
